name: CubeH
description:
CubeH by WISHWAKE

FEATURES:
> Game has a stunning atmosphere is an ideal fusion of "worlds" (snow-covered expanses, forest thickets, firefalls, endless rains, etc.) and unobtrusive, pleasant music.
> A simple and fun gameplay that doesn't let players get bored.
> Enjoy game bonuses (protection against "Pinching Mouth", multiplier points and coins, slowing down time and much more).
> The most dangerous obstacles ("Pinching Mouth", spikes and various monsters).
> Global leaderboards and fun achievements - try to beat your friends' records!
